page_3.text: As Rani wandered, she stumbled upon a hidden path. "Where could this lead?" she wondered, and called for her friend Tiko, the cheerful monkey.
page_3.scene: Rani and Tiko peek around a bend in a vibrant, flowery path, their faces filled with curiosity and excitement.

character.name: Rani
character.description: A cheerful young rhinoceros with big curious eyes and a playful spirit. She has a beautiful grey hide with a small pink flower on her ear.
